post.body: thanks a lot for your suggestion. Looks also like a good app with nice presettings. It's nice to get these helpful replies...
wow handbrake looks really good. Thanks a lot for this hint. I am going to bed now. Will try it tomorrow. Thanks :-)

you're right but I still can feel the pain :) Chicken slaughter...

Welcome Penn! Our congratulations!!! Beautiful photo! May he will become a tiny bmx rider within a few years
yeah! BMX-mas party! Enjoy and have fun... But you guys are still looking sober!?
freaking out with our videocast. Can't get the vids running on the ipod. Have anybody a hint for me for encoding?

playing with my son his new #nintendo #ds and waiting for the roast goose
church is finished now we are waiting for #christkind not #santa #claus. nice #christmas eve to everybody
